Frequently asked questions

Why should I choose the Haaven way over traditional construction?

Prefab is superior to traditional construction in many ways. Haaven spaces are built in controlled environments, which enables more precise manufacturing and causes almost zero delays. Plus, our spaces are designed to last, include energy-saving features, and are built carbon-neutrally.

Do I have to be actively involved in construction?

No. Rest assured, there is no need for you to oversee or handle anything related to the construction of your Haaven space. Our network handles everything from planning, to engineering, and construction. Plus, all these services are already factored into the quotation.

Are Haaven spaces insulated for cold winters?

All Haaven spaces are suitable for 12-month living. Even through the harshest winters. By collaborating with local engineers we tailor the insulation to your local conditions.

Are there any regions where delivery is unavailable?

No. Haaven ensures delivery to every region in Italy and The Netherlands. However, building in very remote locations might complicate transportation and assembly.

Are there any site preparations that I need to take care of myself?

No. Preparing your land-plot has two steps. First, we need to assess the state of the site and understand if anything needs to happen before we place your Haaven space. Second, we remove unwanted vegetation, debris, or old structures. As this depends on your particular situation, this is assessed at a later stage in the process.

Can I customise Collection designs?

Yes. Most designs in our Collection come with a set of configuration options. If you want to personalise the space further, you can choose our Retouche package. With the help of our architects, you can fully customise the design to your wishes and to the rules of your municipality.

Can Haaven help me obtain a building permit?

Yes. We provide full support in obtaining the building permit for your construction project. The process begins with the submission of your design to the municipality for approval. Second, our builders and engineers compile all documentation for the permit application. Typically, the approval takes 4-8 weeks. During this time Haaven keeps you informed about the process.

Do Haaven spaces need maintenance?

Haaven spaces are designed to be low maintenance. However, like all good things in life, some upkeep is necessary to maintain beauty and functionality. While no particular maintenance is required, we advise carrying out ordinary maintenance on exposed wood elements such as external cladding, windows, and doors.

Do you build yourself?

No. Haaven brings together all the right skills from architects, prefabricated home builders and contractors to help you bring your space to life. These professionals are vetted, experienced and trusted.

How environmentally friendly are Haaven spaces?

Haaven spaces are carbon-neutral. We only build NZEB spaces to ensure minimal environmental impact. In contrast, traditional concrete and metal construction contributes to 9% of global carbon emissions.

How long will it take to build my Haaven space?

4 months. Once you approve the contract, building your Haaven space takes 10 to 15 weeks. The completion time can vary based on finishes like the kitchen and bathroom, as they are tailored to your wishes.

Who handles the municipal approval for my building permit?

Haaven handles the permit. Together with our partners, we are in contact with the municipality. We ensure that they receive all necessary documentations on time and keep you in the loop.

How environmentally friendly are Haaven spaces?

Haaven spaces are carbon-neutral. We only build NZEB spaces to ensure minimal environmental impact. In contrast, traditional concrete and metal construction contributes to 9% of global carbon emissions.
